tuv.seg: An tUachtarán - Tithe an Oireachtais a Chomóradh
The President can convene a meeting of either or both Houses of the Oireachtas
Is féidir leis an Uachtarán ceachtar de thithe an Oireachtais, nó iad araon, a chomóradh
Before doing so, the President must first consult with the Council of State
Sula ndéanann sé/sí é sin ní mór don Uachtarán dul i gcomhairle leis an gComhairle Stáit
The President's power to convene a meeting of either or both Houses of the Oireachtas has never been exercised
Níor tharla sé ariamh gur dhein an tUachtarán ceachtar de Thithe an Oireachtais, nó iad araon, a chomóradh
It might be used in an emergency situation
D'fhéadfadh sé/sí é a dhéanamh i gcás práinne
At the meeting of either or both Houses of the Oireachtas, the President may communicate a message or address on any matter of national or public importance
Is féidir leis an Uachtarán teachtaireacht nó aitheasc a chur faoin bhráid cheachtar de Thithe an Oireachtais, nó iad araon, i dtaobh aon ní a bhfuil tábhacht náisiúnta nó tábhacht phoiblí ann
The message or address must first be approved by the Government
Ní mór don Rialtas an teachtaireacht nó aitheasc a cheadú ar dtús
